mapper.select: SELECT cs.student_seq,cs.student_id AS student_id,csc.content AS content, cs.photo_code AS photo_code,cs.photo_name AS photo_name, cs.nickname AS nickname,c.csat_name AS csat_name,IF ( IFNULL(cm.student_seq, 0) = 0, 1, 2) AS rule_seq FROM csat_student cs INNER JOIN csat_student_scqs css ON cs.student_seq = css.student_seq INNER JOIN csat_scqs csc ON css.scqs_seq = csc.scqs_seq INNER JOIN csat c ON cs.csat_seq = c.csat_seq LEFT OUTER JOIN csat_manager cm ON cs.student_seq = cm.student_seq WHERE student_id = #{id,typeHandler=org.redborn.csatlatte.commons.mybatis.AES256TypeHandler} AND student_password = #{password,typeHandler=org.redborn.csatlatte.commons.mybatis.SHA512TypeHandler}

SELECT cs.student_seq,cs.student_id,cs.nickname,cs.use_yn,cc.count_community, ccc.count_comment,cess.avg_score,ccs.count_connection,ccs.last_connection,date_format(cs.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as create_date FROM csat_student cs LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT cs.student_seq,COUNT(cc.community_seq) AS count_community FROM csat_student cs LEFT OUTER JOIN csat_community cc ON cs.student_seq = cc.student_seq GROUP BY cs.student_seq) cc ON cs.student_seq = cc.student_seq LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT cs.student_seq,COUNT(ccc.comment_seq) AS count_comment FROM csat_student cs LEFT OUTER JOIN csat_community_comment ccc ON cs.student_seq = ccc.student_seq GROUP BY cs.student_seq) ccc ON cs.student_seq = ccc.student_seq LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT cs.student_seq,AVG(cess.score) AS avg_score FROM csat_student cs LEFT OUTER JOIN csat_exam_student_score cess ON cs.student_seq = cess.student_seq GROUP BY cs.student_seq) cess ON cs.student_seq = cess.student_seq LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT ccs.student_seq,COUNT(ccs.connection_seq) AS count_connection, DATE_FORMAT(MAX(ccs.connection_date), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS last_connection FROM csat_connection_student ccs GROUP BY ccs.student_seq) ccs ON cs.student_seq = ccs.student_seq WHERE cs.student_seq = #{studentSequence};

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM csat_student WHERE student_seq = #{studentSequence} AND student_password = CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(create_date, '%f%S%i%H'), #{password,typeHandler=org.redborn.csatlatte.commons.mybatis.SHA512TypeHandler})
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM csat_student WHERE ( student_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') OR nickname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') )

SELECT cs.student_seq,cs.student_id,cs.nickname,cs.use_yn,cc.count_community, ccc.count_comment,cess.avg_score,ccs.count_connection,ccs.last_connection FROM csat_student cs LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT cs.student_seq,COUNT(cc.community_seq) AS count_community FROM csat_student cs LEFT OUTER JOIN csat_community cc ON cs.student_seq = cc.student_seq GROUP BY cs.student_seq) cc ON cs.student_seq = cc.student_seq LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT cs.student_seq,COUNT(ccc.comment_seq) AS count_comment FROM csat_student cs LEFT OUTER JOIN csat_community_comment ccc ON cs.student_seq = ccc.student_seq GROUP BY cs.student_seq) ccc ON cs.student_seq = ccc.student_seq LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT cs.student_seq,AVG(cess.score) AS avg_score FROM csat_student cs LEFT OUTER JOIN csat_exam_student_score cess ON cs.student_seq = cess.student_seq GROUP BY cs.student_seq) cess ON cs.student_seq = cess.student_seq LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT ccs.student_seq,COUNT(ccs.connection_seq) AS count_connection, DATE_FORMAT(MAX(ccs.connection_date), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) AS last_connection FROM csat_connection_student ccs GROUP BY ccs.student_seq) ccs ON cs.student_seq = ccs.student_seq WHERE ( student_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') OR nickname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') ) ORDER BY cs.student_seq desc LIMIT #{pageNumber}, 10

SELECT CAST(DATE_FORMAT(create_date, '%H') AS SIGNED) AS hour,COUNT(student_seq) AS count_join FROM csat_student WHERE create_date >= DATE_FORMAT(#{ymd}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AND create_date < DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(#{ymd}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), INTERVAL 1 day) GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(create_date, '%H')

SELECT CAST(DATE_FORMAT(create_date, '%d') AS SIGNED) AS day,COUNT(student_seq) AS count_join FROM csat_student WHERE create_date >= DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT(#{ym}, '01'), '%Y-%m-%d') AND create_date < DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT(#{ym}, '01'), '%Y-%m-%d'), INTERVAL 1 month) GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(create_date, '%d')

SELECT CAST(DATE_FORMAT(create_date, '%m') AS SIGNED) AS year,COUNT(student_seq) AS count_join FROM csat_student WHERE create_date >= DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT(#{year}, '0101'), '%Y-%m-%d') AND create_date < DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT(#{year}, '0101'), '%Y-%m-%d'), INTERVAL 1 year) GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(create_date, '%m')
